name: Hardyguo's blog
tagline: ——Whatever is worth doing is worth doing well.
body:
#  Who is he? 
 He is just a programmer, of course, you can also think he is a hacker.

# where is he?
 Asia.China
 
# what he focused on?
 family
 make friends
 program design
 network protocol
 network security
 software architecture design
